howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.desc: Booking tickets on Evenza is simple. Just follow these quick steps to get started.

step1.title: Find Events
step1.description: Browse and search through a wide variety of upcoming events near you or worldwide.

step2.title: Choose Ticket Type
step2.description: Select from Silver, Golden, or Platinum ticket options based on your preference and budget.

step3.title: Secure Payment
step3.description: Complete your payment safely using various methods with instant confirmation.

step4.title: Receive Your Ticket
step4.description: Get your ticket instantly in your Evenza account and via email.

reviews.title: What Our Users Say
reviews.desc: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what people are saying about their experience with Evenza.

hero.title: Why Evenza?
hero.description: We’re here to transform how people discover and book events — smarter, safer, and easier than ever.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Evenza started with the question: Why isn't booking events easier in a digital age? What began as frustration evolved into a vision for a smarter, seamless way to connect people with events they love.
story.paragraph2: It grew into a platform focused on creating a better experience for discovering and booking events.
story.paragraph3: Today, Evenza helps millions discover and book events, making the experience easy and joyful.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: These core principles guide everything we do at Evenza, from how we build our platform to how we interact with our users and partners.

user.title: User-Focused Experience
user.description: We put our users first in everything we do, creating intuitive experiences that make booking events simple and enjoyable.

quality.title: Quality Events
quality.description: We carefully curate and verify all events on our platform to ensure they meet our high standards of quality and authenticity.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: We believe in clear, upfront pricing with no hidden fees, so you always know exactly what you're paying for.

security.title: Security & Trust
security.description: Your security is paramount. We use industry-leading encryption and fraud detection to keep your data and transactions safe.

global.title: Global Perspective
global.description: We embrace diversity and inclusion, showcasing events from cultures and communities around the world.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: We donate a portion of our proceeds to support arts education and cultural programs in underserved communities.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: The passionate people behind Evenza who work every day to bring amazing events to your fingertips.

feedback.title: Your Feedback
feedback.description: Help us improve your experience with Evenza. Your insights drive our improvements and shape the future of event booking.

card1.title: Quick & Easy
card1.description: Takes less than 2 minutes to share your thoughts

card2.title: Real-time Impact
card2.description: We actively monitor feedback to improve user experience instantly

card3.title: Impactful
card3.description: Every feedback helps us improve our service
